verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> Moses <WH4872> and unto <WH413> Aaron, <WH175> saying, <WH559>

This <WH2063> shall be the service <WH5656> of the sons <WH1121> of Kohath <WH6955> in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation, <WH4150> about the most holy things: <WH6944> <WH6944>

And when the camp <WH4264> setteth forward, <WH5265> Aaron <WH175> shall come, <WH935> and his sons, <WH1121> and they shall take down <WH3381> the covering <WH4539> <WH853> veil, <WH6532> and cover <WH3680> <WH853> the ark <WH727> of testimony <WH5715> with it:

And shall put <WH5414> thereon <WH5921> the covering <WH3681> of badgers' <WH8476> skins, <WH5785> and shall spread <WH6566> over <WH4480> <WH4605> it a cloth <WH899> wholly <WH3632> of blue, <WH8504> and shall put <WH7760> in the staves <WH905> thereof.

And upon <WH5921> the table <WH7979> of shewbread <WH6440> they shall spread <WH6566> a cloth <WH899> of blue, <WH8504> and put <WH5414> thereon <WH5921> <WH853> the dishes, <WH7086> and the spoons, <WH3709> and the bowls, <WH4518> and covers <WH7184> to cover <WH5262> withal: and the continual <WH8548> bread <WH3899> shall be <WH1961> thereon: <WH5921>

And they shall spread <WH6566> upon <WH5921> them a cloth <WH899> of scarlet, <WH8438> <WH8144> and cover <WH3680> the same with a covering <WH4372> of badgers' <WH8476> skins, <WH5785> and shall put in <WH7760> <WH853> the staves <WH905> thereof.

And they shall take <WH3947> a cloth <WH899> of blue, <WH8504> and cover <WH3680> <WH853> the candlestick <WH4501> of the light, <WH3974> and his lamps, <WH5216> and his tongs, <WH4457> and his censers, <WH4289> and all <WH3605> the oil <WH8081> vessels <WH3627> thereof, wherewith <WH834> they minister <WH8334> unto it:

And they shall put <WH5414> it and all <WH3605> the vessels <WH3627> thereof within <WH413> a covering <WH4372> of badgers' <WH8476> skins, <WH5785> and shall put <WH5414> it upon <WH5921> a bar. <WH4132>

And upon <WH5921> the golden <WH2091> altar <WH4196> they shall spread <WH6566> a cloth <WH899> of blue, <WH8504> and cover <WH3680> it with a covering <WH4372> of badgers' <WH8476> skins, <WH5785> and shall put <WH7725> <WH853> to the staves <WH905> thereof:

And they shall take <WH3947> <WH853> all <WH3605> the instruments <WH3627> of ministry, <WH8335> wherewith <WH834> they minister <WH8334> in the sanctuary, <WH6944> and put <WH5414> them in <WH413> a cloth <WH899> of blue, <WH8504> and cover <WH3680> them with a covering <WH4372> of badgers' <WH8476> skins, <WH5785> and shall put <WH5414> them on <WH5921> a bar: <WH4132>
And they shall take away the ashes <WH1878> <WH853> from the altar, <WH4196> and spread <WH6566> a purple <WH713> cloth <WH899> thereon: <WH5921>

And they shall put <WH5414> upon <WH5921> it <WH853> all <WH3605> the vessels <WH3627> thereof, wherewith <WH834> they minister <WH8334> about <WH5921> it, even <WH853> the censers, <WH4289> <WH853> the fleshhooks, <WH4207> and the shovels, <WH3257> and the basins, <WH4219> all <WH3605> the vessels <WH3627> of the altar; <WH4196> and they shall spread <WH6566> upon <WH5921> it a covering <WH3681> of badgers' <WH8476> skins, <WH5785> and put <WH7760> to the staves <WH905> of it.

And when Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> have made an end <WH3615> of covering <WH3680> <WH853> the sanctuary, <WH6944> and all <WH3605> the vessels <WH3627> of the sanctuary, <WH6944> as the camp <WH4264> is to set forward; <WH5265> after <WH310> that, <WH3651> the sons <WH1121> of Kohath <WH6955> shall come <WH935> to bear <WH5375> it: but they shall not <WH3808> touch <WH5060> <WH413> any holy thing, <WH6944> lest they die. <WH4191> These <WH428> things are the burden <WH4853> of the sons <WH1121> of Kohath <WH6955> in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation. <WH4150>

And to the office <WH6486> of Eleazar <WH499> the son <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> the priest <WH3548> pertaineth the oil <WH8081> for the light, <WH3974> and the sweet <WH5561> incense, <WH7004> and the daily <WH8548> meat offering, <WH4503> and the anointing <WH4888> oil, <WH8081> and the oversight <WH6486> of all <WH3605> the tabernacle, <WH4908> and of all <WH3605> that <WH834> therein is, in the sanctuary, <WH6944> and in the vessels <WH3627> thereof.
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> Moses <WH4872> and unto <WH413> Aaron, <WH175> saying, <WH559>
Cut ye not off <WH3772> <WH408> <WH853> the tribe <WH7626> of the families <WH4940> of the Kohathites <WH6956> from among <WH4480> <WH8432> the Levites: <WH3881>

But thus <WH2063> do <WH6213> unto them, that they may live, <WH2421> and not <WH3808> die, <WH4191> when they approach <WH5066> <WH853> unto the most holy things: <WH6944> <WH6944> Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> shall go in, <WH935> and appoint <WH7760> them every one <WH376> <WH376> to <WH5921> his service <WH5656> and to <WH413> his burden: <WH4853>
But they shall not <WH3808> go in <WH935> to see <WH7200> when <WH853> the holy things <WH6944> are covered, <WH1104> lest they die. <WH4191>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>
Take <WH5375> also <WH1571> <WH853> the sum <WH7218> of the sons <WH1121> of Gershon, <WH1648> throughout the houses <WH1004> of their fathers, <WH1> by their families; <WH4940>

And they shall bear <WH5375> <WH853> the curtains <WH3407> of the tabernacle, <WH4908> and the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation, <WH4150> his covering, <WH4372> and the covering <WH4372> of the badgers' skins <WH8476> that <WH834> is above <WH4480> <WH4605> upon <WH5921> it, and the hanging <WH4539> for the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation, <WH4150>

And the hangings <WH7050> of the court, <WH2691> and the hanging <WH4539> for the door <WH6607> of the gate <WH8179> of the court, <WH2691> which <WH834> is by <WH5921> the tabernacle <WH4908> and by <WH5921> the altar <WH4196> round about, <WH5439> and their cords, <WH4340> and all <WH3605> the instruments <WH3627> of their service, <WH5656> and all <WH3605> that <WH834> is made <WH6213> for them: so shall they serve. <WH5647>

At <WH5921> the appointment <WH6310> of Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> shall be <WH1961> all <WH3605> the service <WH5656> of the sons <WH1121> of the Gershonites, <WH1649> in all <WH3605> their burdens, <WH4853> and in all <WH3605> their service: <WH5656> and ye shall appoint <WH6485> unto <WH5921> them in charge <WH4931> <WH853> all <WH3605> their burdens. <WH4853>

This <WH2063> is the service <WH5656> of the families <WH4940> of the sons <WH1121> of Gershon <WH1649> in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation: <WH4150> and their charge <WH4931> shall be under the hand <WH3027> of Ithamar <WH385> the son <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> the priest. <WH3548>

From thirty <WH7970> years <WH8141> old <WH4480> <WH1121> and upward <WH4605> even unto <WH5704> fifty <WH2572> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> shalt thou number <WH6485> them, every one <WH3605> that entereth <WH935> into the service, <WH6635> to do <WH5647> <WH853> the work <WH5656> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation. <WH4150>

This <WH2063> is the service <WH5656> of the families <WH4940> of the sons <WH1121> of Merari, <WH4847> according to all <WH3605> their service, <WH5656> in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation, <WH4150> under the hand <WH3027> of Ithamar <WH385> the son <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> the priest. <WH3548>
